languages.custom: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

description.value:
The golem makes two melee attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d10 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The golem exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save con 19 format=long]], taking [[/damage 10d8 type=poison average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

&Reference[fire]{Fire} Absorption. Whenever the golem is subjected to &Reference[fire]{fire} damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the &Reference[fire]{fire} damage dealt.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Immutable Form. The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Weapons. The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
